extensionDescription.message: Linky - Firefox add-on that simplifies browsing performing redundant tasks in multiple containers

extensionContextMenuLink.description: Label displayed in tab's Context Menu

optionsPageKeyboardShortcutsSectionTitle.description: Title for shortcuts section on Option page

optionsPageKeyboardShortcutContentDetail.message: Opens the currently active tab in all available containers
optionsPageKeyboardShortcutContentDetail.description: Full description for Keyboard shortcut on Option page

shortcutsDescriptionInBrowserManageExten.description: Title for 'Open in all containers' shortcuts in browser manage extension shortcuts panel

optionsPageSettingsSectionTitle.description: Title for Settings section on Options page

optionsPageShortCutsSectionTitle.description: Title for Shortcuts section on Options page

optionsPageAboutSectionTitle.description: Title for About section on Options page

optionsPageAboutSectionAuthorSubsectionT.description: Title for subsection Author into About section on Options page

optionsPageAboutSectionLicenseSubsection.description: Title for subsection License into About section on Options page

optionsPageAboutSectionFeedbackSubsectio.description: Title for subsection Feedback into About section on Options page

typeLetterMessage.description: Error message that displays if you insert just Ctr or Alt without letter

includeModifierKeysMessage.description: Error message that displays if you don't insert Ctrl or Alt (one of them is required)

includeMacModifierKeysMessage.message: Include either Command, Ctrl or Alt
includeMacModifierKeysMessage.description: Error message that displays for Mac if you don't insert Command or Ctrl or Alt (one of them is required)

invalidLetterMessage.message: The letter can not be used
invalidLetterMessage.description: Error message that displays if you try to insert the letter that can not be used

invalidAlreadyReserved.description: Error message that displays if you try to insert the short cuts combination that has already reserved

responseMessageFromBackgroundScript.description: Response message, that displays in browser console in the success result of updating settings on options page

errorMessageEmptyShortcutsSettings.description: Log an error if shortcuts settings are empty
